crush.name: crush
crush.description: If only this field is selected, will be returned YOU + OTHER MEMBER

description_localizations.pt-BR: Se apenas este campo estiver selecionado, será retornado VOCÊ + OUTRO MEMBRO

who.name: who
who.description: If the field CRUSH and WHO is selected, the ship will be between them

description_localizations.pt-BR: Se o campo PAIXONITE e QUEM for selecionado, o crush será entre eles
